title: Incident - VPN Disconnects Frequently
description: A remote user reports their VPN connection drops every 15-20 minutes.

tasks.description: Check the firewall logs for the user's connection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The firewall logs show no errors for the VPN session.

tasks.description: Ask the user to run a speed test and ping test from their home network to check for internet instability.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's local internet connection is found to be unstable with high packet loss.

tasks.description: Advise the user to reboot their home router and contact their Internet Service Provider if the issue persists.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician correctly identifies the issue as outside the company's network and advises the user accordingly.
